  Ã‚Â²              ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸   ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸   ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸              Ã‚Â²

  
   Golden Realms greatly expands Age of Wonders III's empire building 
   mechanics and introduces bucket loads of new content. These new 
   features are used in random maps, new scenarios and a new story 
   campaign, where Halfling survivors settle in a distant land filled 
   with danger and treasures never seen before.

   This Pack includes the main game of Age of Wonders III plus the 
   following:
   
   - Pre Order DLC
   - Deluxe Edition DLC
   - Golden Realms Expansion

   The game has been updated to v1.427 Build 13059
